LanguageData.BodyMod_Abhorrent.label: 혐오스러움
LanguageData.BodyMod_Abhorrent.description: To modify the natural human body is a flagrant violation of clear moral laws.
LanguageData.BodyMod_Approved.label: approved
LanguageData.BodyMod_Approved.description: Humans should strive to reach our full potential by improving our flawed natural bodies.
LanguageData.BodyMod_Disapproved.label: 못마땅함
LanguageData.BodyMod_Disapproved.description: To modify the natural human body is an ugly, dirty act.
